Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-6395 affecting package gnutls for versions less than 3.8.3-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-6395 affecting package gnutls for versions less than 3.8.3-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package gnutls is earlier than 3.8.3-6, affected by CVE-2025-6395
